channel.title: Minigame help! please
channel.description:
Hello i wanna make a minigame but i dont know how?
I want a minigame like this:
We start in level 1 and kill people (players not npc's) and we dont lose items if we die, and if we win in lvl 1 we get 100,000coins and get to level 2 and kill people and bla bla bla, anf if we win in lvl 2 we get 200,000coins and all this happend until we get to level 10... [u]there we lose items [/u] and if we win the last round we get 2mill.
please can somone make this? happy for answers, and sorry for bad spelling.
-Meele

item.title: Minigame help! please
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

[quote=“bobbie1990, post:3, topic:286563”][quote author=heroisgay link=topic=378980.msg2850260#msg2850260 date=1246495997]
Just a question but, how would you know you have enough players for every single team to have a different team to fight against in every round. Oh n btw, noone is going to basically make a minigame for you.
[/quote]
trust me it will be easy!

ok i know that but i just need a “kick” start on what to do :D[/quote]

I suggest looking in the seach bar for tutorials on making minigames. You should have some sort of basic information before asking for help. If you’re trying to make a minigame with players fighting waves of NPCs look at the codes for fight cave as a head start. That’s basically what you’ll be doing excluding a few extra things.

Read full topic

item.title: Minigame help! please
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Hello i wanna make a minigame but i dont know how?

I want a minigame like this:

We start in level 1 and kill people (players not npc’s) and we dont lose items if we die, and if we win in lvl 1 we get 100,000coins
and get to level 2 and kill people and bla bla bla, anf if we win in lvl 2 we get 200,000coins
and all this happend until we get to level 10… there we lose items and if we win the last round we get 2mill.

please can somone make this?
happy for answers, and sorry for bad spelling.
